heading: HR00982
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION (DOTr) AND THE OFFICE OF THE CIVIL AVIATION  AUTHORITY OF THE PHILIPPINES (CAAP) TO INCLUDE AND DECLARE THE DIPOLOG CITY AIRPORT IN THE PROVINCE OF ZAMBOANGA DEL NORTE AS ONE OF THE ALTERNATE  INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00982
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION (DOTr) AND THE OFFICE OF THE CIVIL AVIATION AUTHORITY OF THE PHILIPPINES (CAAP) TO INCLUDE AND DECLARE THE DIPOLOG CITY AIRPORT IN THE PROVINCE OF ZAMBOANGA DEL NORTE AS ONE OF THE ALTERNATE INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT
